price: 23 Et ne dis jamais : « Je ferai telle chose demain »,
arabic: وَلَا تَقُولَنَّ لِشَاْيۡءٍ إِنِّي فَاعِلٞ ذَٰلِكَ غَدًا

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: walā taqūlanna lishāy'in innī fāʿilun dhālika ghadan
